entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet list package` command options should support shorter names. For example, -f for --framework. Have to specify the long name every time. #37385
  • dotnet tool update form private registry fails #37379
  • [NETSDKE2E]The directory "C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk-manifests" could not be deleted after uninstalling 6.0.312 SDK. #37374
  • Supporting commandLineArgs in launchsettings.json as an array of strings #37373
  • Dotnet SDK 8 breaks deterministic builds #37371

Closed

  • .NET 8 SDK upgrade breaks MSBuildLocator #37111
  • OutputType does not set Nt headers correctly on Linux #3990
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk imports CustomBeforeDirectoryBuildProps after DirectoryBuildPropsPath #36749
  • "AfterPublish" doesn't invoked #26710
    8.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37386
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate from prebuilt baseline #37384
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37382
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Check dependencies of Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver against baseline #37381
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Disable Source Link's EmbedUntrackedSources in desktop WPF projects #37164
    Servicing-approved, Area-SourceLink, 8.0.2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Simplify and improve signature verification for workloads on Windows #36787
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add escape hatch for publishing with SelfContained=true, but no RuntimeIdentifier. #37368
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Permit setting whether to use workload sets or loose manifests Fixes #34561 #37346
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #35088
    Area-Tools, 8.0.2xx
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Containers support was moved higher to enable creating image of CLI apps #37335
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
